metafield_definitions.name: Selling Points
metafield_definitions.description: List of product selling points displayed on product pages. Each point highlights a key feature or benefit.

metafield_definitions.name: Product Badges
metafield_definitions.description: Badges to display on product cards (e.g., 'new', 'bestseller', 'limited'). Used by sz-badges section.

graphql_mutations.create_selling_points: mutation CreateSellingPointsMetafield { metafieldDefinitionCreate(definition: { namespace: "shelzys", key: "selling_points", name: "Selling Points", description: "List of product selling points", type: "list.single_line_text_field", ownerType: PRODUCT, pin: true, visibleToStorefrontApi: true }) { createdDefinition { id } userErrors { field message } } }
graphql_mutations.create_badges: mutation CreateBadgesMetafield { metafieldDefinitionCreate(definition: { namespace: "shelzys", key: "badges", name: "Product Badges", description: "Product badges for display", type: "list.single_line_text_field", ownerType: PRODUCT, pin: true, visibleToStorefrontApi: true, validations: [{ name: "choices", value: "[\"new\", \"bestseller\", \"limited\", \"sale\", \"exclusive\", \"back-in-stock\"]" }] }) { createdDefinition { id } userErrors { field message } } }
